name: A Week Of Chicken
description:
A game made in 48 hrs for the Ludum Dare game jam #40.

You're a chicken farmer, but you've lost your 21 chickens. You must now set out to find all of your lost chickens, but beware as danger lurks in the dark.

  • Use WASD to move
  • Right mouse button to grab chickens
  • Left mouse button to scare wolves
